About Me

Let me tell you a few things about me

Bio

I'm from India currently pursuing my Bachelor of Technology degree from Jecrc University, Jaipur. I have a huge interest in Web Development.
My Skills: HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, JavaScript, PHP, jQuery, Ajax, Laravel, Sass.

BattleGod

Freelance Back-end Developer

BattleGod is an online PubG tournament website where users can make or participate in tournament.
I was assigned for developing the Back-end of the website and for the integration of Payment API.

Take Me 2 Tech

Fullstack Web Developer

Take Me 2 Tech is a digital marketplace for selling and buying digital scripts, plugins, themes etc.
I was assigned for developing the whole website with Payment integration.

Employee Refer System

Fullstack Web Developer

Employee Refer is a website made for refering the employees.
I was assigned for developing the website.
